article.title: Local Events - Indio U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about events presented by the Indio U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​

The U.S. Commercial organizes and supports conferences, seminars, and events to educate our clients and promote international trade. Our goal is to help local U.S. exporters sell globally. A sampling of our events includes:

  • Executive briefings in our office with one of our visiting Commercial Service Offi​​cers from around the world.
  • Educational export seminars and online webinars.
  • Matchmaking and export counseling services at international trade shows overseas and the U.S.

By organizing trade missions and educational seminars; providing matching or export counseling services at trade shows; and recruiting buyer delegations to U.S. trade shows, the U.S. Government helps U.S. exporters expand global sales at trade events.

Local Events

​

EXPORTECH Inland Empire – Fall Session(November 11, December 09, 2014 and January 13, 2015). Claremont, CA.Click hereorcontact Elizabeth Glynn,eglynn@cmtc.comor 310-984-0728 for more information.

Export Trade Assistance Partnership (ETAP): Successful Exporting in Today's Global Economy.Seminar Program - October 9, October 16, October 23, October 30, 2014. Chaffey College - Chino Community Center.Learn more.

Free Export Seminarorganized by U.S. Congresswoman Grace F. Napolitano. October 23, 2014. University of La Verne.Learn more​.

Grow Your Business Through Exports – featuring U.S. Rep. Ed Royce.October 30, 2014.Pomona, California.Learn more.

Growing Locally Expanding Globally: Food and Agriculture Conference on Export Opportunities.November 10, 2014.Fantasy Springs Resort 94-245 Indio Springs Pkwy Indio, California. Check back for more information or contacttony.michalski@trade.gov.

"Export University 101"hosted by City of Murrieta. December 4, 2014 –save-the-date!

How to do Business in the Pacific Rim,organized by California Asian Pacific Chamber of Commerce. December 4, 2014. Los Angeles.Learn more​.

Defense Trade Essentials. December 9, 2014. Sheraton Gateway Los Angeles Hotel.Learn more.
